title:
Battling Young Ones Odor's By Using Junior Varsity Natural’s Kids Deodorants

attachments.displayName:
Battling Young Ones Odor's By Using Junior Varsity Natural’s Kids Deodorants

http://www.ourwolvesden.net/2013/11/battling-young-ones-odors-by-using.html

No mother wants to admit that their children "stink". When those joyful bundles come bouncing through the door with a smile from ear to ear, nobody wants to admit that an offensive odor had become attached to your child while they were out romping through the yard. My children work hard and they play even harder, which makes for a whirlwind of smells omitting from each of them.
